The SciViews Box is a VirtualBox virtual machine completely installed with Xubuntu, R, R Studio, Python, Jupyter and Spyder, plus more than a thousand packages. It will be also provided with a quick installer and a quick launcher.

**This is a work in progress... please, come back later!**
